name: qwertysaurs
description:
These little critters are the result of a challenge that was intended to help familiarize myself with the Figma pen tool. The intention was to create a "Qwertysaur" by making a shape in one single attempt.


The rules were:

  1. Every shape must be made using a single path, and it must be a flat, 2-D doodle.
  2. You cannot correct or edit the path in any way after you make the initial shape.
  3. Add a circle for an eye and an optional line for a mouth to turn the shape into a convincing creature.


Make one a day for any amount of time to help develop your eye for creating interesting, organic shapes.


Each of my qwertysaurs has an orb that identifies it as either a land dweller (green shades), aquatic creature (blue shades), or flying creature (red shades). To me, that makes it feel like a miniature ecosystem. You don't have to do all that.


If you try this challenge, tag me!
